name: Cosmic Endeerment
description:
In a spacey dreamscape where love is not an object to be won, possessed, or coveted...

Play as a space deer cultivating an endless amount of cosmic gardens!

Spend time with your flowerbeds and they will grow in your presence! Leave them unattended and they will wither and decay (fear not, the return of your loving attention can always restore them). Take care of them, and they will bloom for you!

Healthy, full-bloomed gardens will attract a deer mate for you to nuzzle and feed!

Originally uploaded at http://anthonybecker.itch.io/cosmic-endeerment

This game is a prototype made in 24 hours for the GXDev game jam put on by @GaymerX. We're currently building a complete version to be released late 2015 or 2016. For updates, find us on Twitter @polyfawnstudio!
